mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (PRODUCT_NAME, PRICE, DESCRIPTION, BRAND, COLOR, STOCK) VALUES (#{productName}, #{price}, #{description}, #{brand}, #{color}, #{stock})
mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_KEY, PRODUCT_NAME, PRICE, CATEGORY, DESCRIPTION, BRAND, COLOR, STOCK FROM PRODUCT WHERE DEL_FLAG = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName}, PRICE = #{price}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, BRAND = #{brand}, COLOR = #{color}, STOCK = #{stock} WHERE PRODUCT_KEY = #{productKey}
